title: Making a Simple Appointment by Phone

content.text: In this lesson, you'll learn how to call a business and make a simple appointment. We'll practice calling a hairdresser, 'la peluquería'.

data.meaning: I would like to make an appointment

data.tip: In Spain, the 'ci' sounds like 'th' in 'think'. In Latin America, it sounds like 's' in 'see'.

content.title: Calling the Hairdresser
content.setting: You are calling the hairdresser, 'Peluquería Estilo', to make an appointment.

conversation_flow.title: Greet the receptionist and state your name

extract_info.user_name: Extract the user's name from their message

conversation_flow.title: State that you want to make an appointment
Respond to the question about when you'd like to come
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Claro. ¿Para un corte de pelo? ¿Cuándo le gustaría venir?

content.text: Great start! Now let's learn how to talk about days and times. To say 'on Friday' in Spanish, you say 'el viernes'.

data.meaning: Is it possible at another time?

data.tip: The 'v' in Spanish is often pronounced like a soft 'b', somewhere between the English 'b' and 'v' sounds.

content.title: Finding a Day and Time
content.setting: The receptionist is trying to find a time that works for you. You need to state your preferences.

conversation_flow.title: State your preference for a day (Friday)
State your preference for a time of day (the afternoon)
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: El viernes... ¿por la mañana o por la tarde?

conversation_flow.title: Decline the proposed time and ask for another option
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Tengo una hora libre a las tres. ¿Está bien?

content.text: Excellent! You're almost there. Now you just need to agree, confirm the details, and end the call politely.

content.title: Confirming the Appointment
content.setting: You are finalizing the details of your appointment and ending the call.

conversation_flow.title: Agree to the new time
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Sí, a las cinco es posible. ¿Le va bien?

conversation_flow.title: Confirm the day and time
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Muy bien. Su cita es el viernes a las cinco.

conversation_flow.title: Thank the receptionist and end the call
